content:
Welcome to Easthampton BEES #This is the website for Easthamptons Biodiversity, Environment, and Ecological Sustainability (BEES) committee.
Here you’ll find helpful hints, guides and information about all those things and actions we’re taking!
This will show up in just a second!
We on the BEES committee are starting to play with our own website. Let us know what you think, and follow along using old school RSS, it actually rocks!
title: Hello World

content: Committee Links # BEES Committee on the city website Sign up for our newsletter Sign up for our volunteer list Gardening and Personal Rewilding links # Humane Gardener A wonderful website that helps you figure out how to work and live with nature, rather than trying to control it
title: Links
